titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Biss family photograph collection.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Family of Raleigh and Vera Biss of Virginia, Minn.
archdesc.scopecontent: Photos of Ann Arbor, Royal Oak, Detroit, and St. Ignace, Mich., taken on a family trip. Scenes include Detroit Zoo, University of Michigan campus, and General Motors Proving Ground. Also Vera Biss' 1935 installment contract for a used Chevrolet.
